scripts.start: npm install -g cross-env; npm install; npm run dev
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack-dev-server --hot --inline --progress --no-info --mode development --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js --disable-host-check
scripts.dev-bundle: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack --inline --progress --no-info --mode development --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.dev-bundle-system: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.system webpack --inline --progress --no-info --mode development --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.dev-legacy: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.legacy DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack --mode development --watch --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.dev-legacy-system: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.legacy DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.system webpack --mode development --watch --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.js; npm run prod-legacy
scripts.prod-system: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.system webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.js; npm run prod-legacy
scripts.prod-legacy: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.legacy.prod DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.legacy.js
scripts.prod-legacy-system: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.legacy.prod DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.system webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.legacy.js
